sys_hub_action_type_definition.copied_from_name: SN - Agent Get ServiceNow Task D
sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Use this tool to get a list of ServiceNow task to analyze. Use this tool for each table the user selected. For example if the user selected HR Cases and Incidents you would run this tool once with the table input of "sn_hr_core_case" and then run it again with a table input of "incident" and so on based on the options the user selected.
Input Info: date: [This is the calculated Date of the current date and the users choice of how many days in the past to search for] Example: If today's date is 2025-01-01 and the user asks for 60 days of past data, the date input would be 2024-11-18. Format date as YYYY-MM-DD
table: [This is the table to query based on the users selection and must always be lowercase]
This tool will return up to 100 tickets based on the date and table date you input.
Here are the table selections again that were provided to the user. You MUST also use a value that is all lowercase for the table input.
1. HR Case (sn_hr_core_case) 2. CSM Case (sn_customerservice_case) 3. Universal Request (universal_request) 4. Incident (incident) 5. Catalog Task (sc_task) 6. Change Request (change_request) 7. Problem (problem)
